channel.title: Propulsion on SUPER-Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Propulsion on SUPER-Lab

item.title: Low mass RF power inverter for cubesat plasma thruster using 3D printed inductors
item.description: This paper presents the design of a low mass RF power inverter at moderate to high power levels (e.g. tens of watts and above) for weight critical applications such as cubesat plasma thrusters. Our approach for mass reduction includes resonant switching operation at tens of MHz, and the 3D printing of light-weight scaffolds that form air core inductors after plating with a thin layer of copper. Specifically, we present a 14.2 MHz 50 W resonant DC-RF power inverter implemented with 3D printed and plated air core toroidal inductors. The inverter achieves 90% electrical efficiency when operated on a 50 Î© resistive load at an input voltage of 50 V.
